Hello! My name is Scott Gamit and I am currently enrolled in the UCF Coding Bootcamp. My hobbies are thrifting, eating pizza, and playing video games. All in that order. My cat Elliot is my best friend. After this bootcamp, I wish to work for Spotify or possibly any video game dev. My current motto is "Someone's fears are not your fears." You are the best. Git Gud ğŸ®ğŸ•¹ï¸

The gitGud project aims to reach gamers, or fresh faces in general, who want to find a new multiplayer game to dive into. Users will have the ability to check out some of the hottest games, learn from the pros, and get involved in the community.

Reel Good Movies ğŸ¬ğŸï¸

Reel Good Movies is a full stack web application where a user can register an account, search in a movie database, post a review for movie, and save movies to their watched and will watch profile lists

Spoil This Movie ğŸ¿ğŸ¥ğŸ¬

Spoil This Movie is a website uses the OMDB API to search for movies and display the poster, title, and plot of the movie. Spoiler Alert!
